sentences.sContent: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.sCn: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.sContent: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.sCn: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.sContent: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.sCn: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

sentences.sContent: ...we may naturally arrive at the conclusion that we shouldn’t spend too much time on their computer terminal rather than relating to people in the real world...
...and the manuals should arrive tomorrow or the day after at the latest...
...When next year’s crop of high-school graduates arrive at Oxford University in the fall of 2009...

trans.tranOther: to get to the place you are going to
